overview: With the grace of Shinseon, 'Go Gyo-ram' acquires the form of a woman after long training. Then , one day, while spending peaceful days helping the villagers of 'Go Gyo-Ram' who went down to the village with the herbalist 'Unsaeng Jang', whom they met by chance, a plague begins to circulate in the village due to a conspiracy of evil spirits to absorb human spirit. In response, 'Go Gyo Ram' treats the villagers with all their heart, but she is misunderstood as a witch because of her evil plot, and her life as well as her world are in danger of destruction...
title: An act of Providence
